description: Charges in a straight line after a delay.
Shoots a projectile. Spawns 2 Mini Blobs on death.
Charges at the player. Moves faster when near other enemies.
Stops to shoot 3 projectiles in a spread.
Stops to quickly dash at the player.
Stops to shoot a large, slow projectile.
Shoots a projectile that leaves a damaging pool on the ground.
Stops to shoot a fast projectile. Teleports away when damaged.
Charges at the player. Becomes faster after being damaged.
Moves randomly. Invulnerable while burrowed underground.
